means: 布尔茹瓦(Leon Victor Auguste,1851-1925，法国政治家，曾获1920年诺贝尔和平奖)

sentence.Network_en: His privileged bourgeois family insisted on a good education.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那优越的资产阶级家庭坚持让他接受良好的教育。

sentence.Network_en: He thought they might infect others with their bourgeois ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为他们可以用他们的资产阶级思想去影响别人。

sentence.Network_en: He had a petit bourgeois mentality.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 而布尔乔亚（bourgeois）指的就是这些聚集在城市这个地理空间范围内而享有独特政治法律地位的市民。这里的关键在于，作为一个 …
拥有中产阶级(Bourgeois)物质上的丰饶和波希米亚人(Bohemian)精神上的自由，是新资讯时代的精英份子，有自己独特的消费理念， …
六级单词表_百度文库 ... bound a. 应当的;必定的 bourgeois a. 资产阶级的;平庸的 box n. 专席.
...社会中的私人个体，经常被人津津乐道，而且通常是根据法国大革命的术语，称之为citoyens（公民）和bourgeois（资产阶级）。在一个更复杂的层面上，我们可以将“对政治自由之喜好”的消失，视为个人向“内心的良知领域”退缩，在那.

list.abs: Bourdon 波登bourgeois rights 资产阶级法权bourrasque 巴拉斯各雷暴地中海上的一种雷暴或猛烈飑.
推荐理由一：中级庄(Cru Bourgeois)AOC，优于普通AOC。 "Cru Bourgeois"是法国波尔多葡萄酒庄分级制度的一种;更精确的说，是 …
作为被法国政府认可的贵族名庄（Cru Bourgeois），乐朗酒庄（Laulan Ducos）的历史可以追溯到1460年，由于沿袭了法国贵族对于 …
The slogan of bourgeois revolution is equality , liberty and fraternity ., 资产阶级革命的口号是自由平等博爱.
口译词汇大全 - 英语专业考研论坛 ... 资产负债表 balance sheet 资产阶级自由化 bourgeois liberalization 资不抵债 insolvency.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French, from late Latin burgus 'castle' (in medieval Latin 'fortified town'), ultimately of Germanic origin and related to boroughCompare with burgess

entry.tran: 传统中产阶级的（含贬义）
entry.def: If you describe people, their way of life, or their attitudes as bourgeois, you disapprove of them because you consider them typical of conventional middle-class people.

example.ex: He's accusing them of having a bourgeois and limited vision.
example.tran: 他指责他们像中产阶级一样目光狭隘。

entry.tran: （马克思主义者所指的）资本主义的，资产阶级的
entry.def: Marxists use bourgeois when referring to the capitalist system and to the social class that owns most of the wealth in that system.

example.ex: ...the modern bourgeois society that has sprouted from the ruins of feudal society...
example.tran: 从封建社会的废墟上发展起来的现代资本主义社会

example.ex: His privileged bourgeois family insisted on a good education.
example.tran: 他那优越的资产阶级家庭坚持让他接受良好的教育。

means.word_mean: 1. a capitalist who engages in industrial commercial enterprise
2. a member of the middle class
1. (according to Marxist thought) being of the property-owning class and exploitive of the working class
2. conforming to the standards and conventions of the middle class;

auth_sentence.content: She hates the bourgeois stiffness of Che's grandmother.
auth_sentence.res_content: She hates the bourgeois stiffness of Che's grandmother.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She hates the bourgeois stiffness of Che's grandmother.

auth_sentence.content: This was tastefulness without a hint of bourgeois conceit.
auth_sentence.res_content: This was tastefulness without a hint of bourgeois conceit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This was tastefulness without a hint of bourgeois conceit.

auth_sentence.content: San Francisco still has its share of Bourgeois Bohemians.
auth_sentence.res_content: San Francisco still has its share of Bourgeois Bohemians.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: San Francisco still has its share of Bourgeois Bohemians.

sentences.en: The princess was ostracized for marrying a rich bourgeois.
sentences.cn: 公主因与一位资产阶级分子结婚而被逐出皇族。

jushi.english: What's the future of bourgeois society?
jushi.chinese: 资本主义社会的前景如何？

jushi.english: She is the most bourgeois person.
jushi.chinese: 她是个极其唯利是图的人。

jushi.english: She's become terribly bourgeois since she joined the golf club.
jushi.chinese: 自她加入高尔夫球俱乐部后，变得市侩气十足。
